attributes.action: Take all dwellings let to Housing Benefit recipients into Government Ownership
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. Billions of pounds have been spent and are being spent on Housing Benefit since its introduction.
2. Taking those dwelling into public ownerships will be self financing and will build a stock for future generations.
3. It will stop fraud at a stroke and save money to the tax payer.
